name: Cup Cozy - Black, White, and Yellow with Flowers
description:
This one of a kind cup cozy will keep your fingertips and hands safe from the steaming hotness of your coffee or tea!

Made with my signature style, this cozy is unlike any other!

Fun fabrics, fun fringe, and great design!!!

Lovely tone on tone black fabric with 'starbursts' paired with a wonderful modern floral print.  And check out the grey fringe!  Fabulous!!!

The inner fabric is a Michael Miller damask print!!! How FUN!

Made in my pet and smoke free studio.

Hand wash or gentle delicate cycle. Air dry.

name: Cup Cozy - Black and white Bicycles
description:
This one of a kind cup cozy will keep your fingertips safe from the steaming hotness of your coffee or tea!

Made with my signature style, this cozy is unlike any other!

Fun fabrics, fun fringe, and great design!!!

How fun is this fabric?  Who says black and white has to be boring? This bicycle print paired with the black and white floral pattern will adorn your coffee cup in style!  Embellished with green and blue furry fringe makes your cup cozy one of a kind!

The inside has a Michael Miller damask fabric.

Made in my pet and smoke free studio.

Hand wash or gentle delicate cycle. Air dry.

name: Cup Cozy - Amy Butler design
description:
This one of a kind cup cozy will keep your fingertips safe from the steaming hotness of your coffee or tea!

Made with my signature style, this cozy is unlike any other!

Fun fabrics, fun fringe, and great design!!!

I LOVE Amy Butler's fabrics because they are so amazing!!! This red and pink floral print paired with this red with pink polka dots will adorn your coffee cup in style!

The inside has a whimsical heart print fabric.

Made in my pet and smoke free studio.

Hand wash or gentle delicate cycle. Air dry.
